Articles.Author: CBS News
Articles.Title: Richard Roundtree, star of "Shaft" movies, dies at 81
Articles.Description: Actor Richard Roundtree, who played the cool New York private detective John Shaft in the iconic "Shaft" movie franchise, has died at the age of 81. Roundtree had a prolific career in film, television and theater which spanned five decades.
Articles.Content:
